data.text: @PakhiddeAnurag Hello Sir, Yes this flight is operational & is a repatriation flight. We request you to kindly go through the scope of as the repatriation flights by Air France are in strict compliance with EXIT regulations as defined by the local authorities in India.

@Anjali_S_K Hello Ma'am, phone lines are working fine. Could be that  lines are occupied due high call volumes. Our colleagues at the "Customer Contact Centre" will be able to assist you. Please connect with them at 18004192033 or 911246233502. (Mon-Fri,8am-8pm & Sat-Sun (9am - 5pm). Regards

data.text: @AirFranceIN For airlines, flying during the corona crisis means operating under exceptional circumstances. The current situations calls for a series of measures, in order to safely & healthily carry out flight operations for passengers and crew. More info https://t.co/hRXobn1bSj
